channel.title: Read Plz!
channel.description: Hey im using allstarscape base and ii added claws how do i fix the melee so it hits like a wepon ty

item.title: Read Plz!
item.dc:creator: @XRangdaltonX XRangdaltonX
item.description:
@XRangdaltonX wrote:

Despite it’s unstableness, i love allstar. Look up “Two hand” and you’ll see a bunch of id’s. Add the claw id in the same format. Also, look up “abyssal whip” and everything that comes up as that, that involves gfx’s, animations, and maxhit’s copy those , replace the whip id with the claws, and replace maxhit with what you want it to hit, the emote that happens when you attack. Also, add DDsdamage in their too, for when you use the special, but put it twice to get a four hit outcome. That’s as detailed as i’m going to get. Most of this is in client.java btw.

Read full topic
